title: Effects of sowing date and nitrogen applications on the energy efficiency of facultative wheat (Triticum aestivum L.) in a Pannonian environment
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Gerhard Moitzi, Lukas J. Koppensteiner, Agnieszka Klimek-Kopyra, Jaroslav Bernas, Hans-Peter Kaul, Helmut Wagentristl, Pia Euteneuer, Reinhard W. Neugschwandtner
